overview: Evadaithe Nakenti is a Action Based Movie, Directed By V.samudra.Rajasekhar is Army major and comes to Hyderabad on two months leave. His father Raghuvaran is a corrupt minister and would do anything to become the chief minister. Raghuvaranâ€™s two sons-in-law are IAS and IPS, they too are corrupt and in fact encourage and support their father-in-law in all his deeds. Like any other film, here too Rajasekhar has got a loving sister and an innocent mother who hold up to him.
title: Evadaithe Nakenti
